definition: to correct (e.g. sight or hearing)/to rectify/to cure
to correct/to rectify/to redress/strong/brave/to pretend/to feign/affectation
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Compound Iron Fertilizers had significant effects on rectifying peanuts chlorosis caused by iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 复混铁肥土施矫治石灰性土壤花生缺铁黄化效果显著。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical curative effect of segmental arch technique in incisor luxation.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价片段弓矫治技术治疗前牙外伤的效果。

sentences.english: After the fixed orthodontics was over, the occurrence of enamel demineralization was observed.
sentences.chinese: 待矫治结束拆除矫治装置后观察釉质脱矿的发生情况。

sentences.english: After the fixed orthodontics was over, the occurrence of enamel demineralization was observed.
sentences.chinese: 待矫治结束拆除矫治装置后观察釉质脱矿的发生情况。

sentences.english: A technology of the concealed teeth correcting equipment is developed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于光固化法的隐形牙齿矫治器的制作技术。

sentences.english: The leaf regained normal structure after correcting iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 进行缺铁黄化矫治后，叶片结构恢复正常。

sentences.english: Expending dental-arch is one of the methods being used popularly in orthodontics. but there are few researches on its basical laws.
sentences.chinese: 扩大牙弓是临床常用的牙列畸形矫治方法之一。

sentences.english: The orthodontics effect of upper-incision was better.
sentences.chinese: 上切牙拥挤矫治效果较下切牙好。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of moxibustion at Zhiyin(BL 67)for correcting the fetus malposition.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察艾灸至阴穴矫治胎位不正的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The higher K constant was, the higher incidence of post-operative heart failure would be.
sentences.chinese: 常数值明显增高者，心内矫治术后发生心衰较多。

sentences.english: The researcher simulated the anchorage tooth movement in the orthodontic therapy and established the zoic trial model.
sentences.chinese: 建立动物实验模型模拟正畸矫治中支抗牙移动。

sentences.english: Objective To study the treatment methods and effects of the skeletal crossbite.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究骨性反牙合的矫治方法与效果。

sentences.english: Have you ever thought of a job as an audiologist?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经听说过一个称为“听觉病矫治专家”的职业吗？

sentences.english: It hasbeen highly recommended to adopt the abdominal respiration method during the speech therapy.
sentences.chinese: 腹式呼吸方式是言语矫治训练中应采用的正确方式。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anesthetic management of one-stage corrective surgery in infant with interrupted aortic arch.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨婴儿主动脉弓中断矫治术的麻醉处理。

sentences.english: It provides reference for program of training MR children.
sentences.chinese: 为制定训练和矫治计划提供参考依据。

definition: to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
to kick a drug habit/to abstain from drugs
